Posted By: Dave
I am looking to trade the following 3 cards for cards in similar condition that I need.  If you are interested in any of them, let me know. 

I will also sell the 3 cards for $40 if anyone is interested in just purchasing them. 

Schlei - Sweet Caporal 150 (heavy creases in 2 spots with tape on back.  Not sure if it was torn and taped or the tape was added to strengthen the crease)
Bell - Sweet Caporal 150
Lavendar - Sweet Caporal 350
